name: Netvibes compact & sans serif
description: Changes Netvibes feed reader to a slightly more compact style and a sans serif font.
additional_info:
v003 [130317] version for Netvibes
v002 [130315] minor tweaks for 1024x768:
- left padding of feedlist in left sidebar minimized
- left sidebar smaller
v001 [130314] initial release (for Bloglines)
